channel.title: [NTX]With the NXT Game client and ripping models
channel.description: While preloading the NXT client you need to let it download 8.3GB in the background is this going to make it more easier to rip models of cities or weapons from the cache files?

item.title: [NTX]With the NXT Game client and ripping models
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

While loading the current RS client it also downloads the cache… what exactly is your point?

It’ll only “easier” if they gave us .mqo files without putting them into the cache… which I don’t think is the case

Read full topic
item.source: [NTX]With the NXT Game client and ripping models
